author: Sabine Hossenfelder
description:
Go to https://ground.news/sabine to get 40% Off the Vantage plan and see through sensationalized reporting. Stay fully informed on events around the world with Ground News.

We’re more than 100 days into the new Trump administration, and the president has made a lot of changes to federal science funding in the U.S. – budgets have been slashed, people have been fired, and 75% of American scientists are apparently considering leaving the country. What does all this mean for the future of science? Let’s take a look. 

The full interview with the previous NIH director is here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=U8CcOAsyORM

title: Trump dramatically cuts science budgets and scientists are fleeing. Now what?
